value.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.excerpt: Monitor and maintain Azure Active Directory

value.title: Provision an Azure SQL database to store application data
value.excerpt: Find out what makes Azure SQL Database a good choice for your relational database, how to create the database from the portal and connect with Azure Cloud Shell.

value.title: Secure your Azure SQL Database
value.excerpt: Secure an Azure SQL database to keep the information safe and diagnose potential security concerns as they happen.

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Manage services with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure cloud platform through the Azure portal, where you create and manage all of your Azure resources.

value.title: An overview of Azure Data Explorer (ADX) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Manoj Raheja joins Lara Rubbelke to demonstrate Azure Data Explorer (ADX) and provide an overview of the service from provisioning to querying. ADX is a fast, fully managed data analytics service for real-time analysis on large volumes of streaming data. It brings together a highly performant and scalable

value.title: Azure API for FHIR (Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Michael Hansen joins Scott Hanselman to explain what FHIR is and how to get started with FHIR on Azure. Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (or, FHIR) is a new standard for representing and exchanging healthcare data. Developed by the HL7 community to address problems with interoperability, pieces
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/5vS7Iq9vpXE" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: How to connect and deliver services privately on Azure with Azure Private Link | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Narayan Anamalai joins Donovan Brown to introduce Azure Private Link. value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Introduction to Azure SQL
value.excerpt: This module introduces Azure SQL. Learn about various deployment options and service tiers and what to use for your organization.

value.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

value.title: Create a language model with Language Understanding
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) and show how to build and publish a LUIS model.

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Discover how Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing for your application to improve the performance and availability of your application.

value.title: Explore and analyze time-stamped data with Time Series Insights
value.excerpt: Azure Time Series Insights allows you to collect, process, store, analyze, and query data at Internet Of Things (IoT) scale. Learn how to deploy this service and use it to gain insights from data generated by IoT devices.
